title: Conduct Site Feasibility Study
description: A developer is considering purchasing a parcel of land for a new apartment complex and needs a feasibility study.

tasks.description: Analyze local zoning codes to determine the maximum number of units and building height allowed on the parcel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the development potential based on zoning.

tasks.description: Research local market rents and vacancy rates for similar apartment complexes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers data to project potential income.

tasks.description: Create a pro-forma financial model estimating development costs, potential income, and return on investment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a detailed financial projection to guide the purchase decision.
